trans-unit.source: Provides information about the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> elements within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações sobre os elementos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> elements are the only allowable child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> elementos são os elementos filhos permitido somente de um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The order of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> elements within the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> defines the page order.
trans-unit.target: A ordem do <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> elementos dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> define a ordem da página.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> provides information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> elements within a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> without the requiring the application to load individual pages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> Fornece informações sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> elementos dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> sem a necessidade do aplicativo ao carregar as páginas individuais.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> dependency property specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> Especifica uma propriedade de dependência de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] do <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> element, see Chapter 3 of the XPS *Open XML Paper Specification* available for download at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> elemento, consulte o capítulo 3 do XPS *Open XML Paper Specification* disponível para download em [XPS: especificação e Downloads de licença](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the process of adding <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> to a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra o processo de adição de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> para um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra o uso do <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> associado a esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent" />, or **null** when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> is set by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> associado a esta <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent" />, ou **nulo** quando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> é definido pelo <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source" /> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Child%2A> property returns a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> when:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Child%2A> propriedade retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> quando:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> has an immediate <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> child defined in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> tem imediato <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> filho definido em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] marcação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.System%23Windows%23Markup%23IAddChild%23AddChild%2A> has been called to set the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> as the child of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.System%23Windows%23Markup%23IAddChild%23AddChild%2A> foi chamado para definir o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> como o filho de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Child%2A> property returns **null** when:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Child%2A> propriedade retorna **nulo** quando:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> is set by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> property (when specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> is not cached).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> é definido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> propriedade (quando especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> não é armazenado em cache).

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRoot%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> to return the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> when set by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRoot%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> para retornar o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> quando definido o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> element, see Chapter 3 of the XPS *XML Paper Specification* available for download at [http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> elemento, consulte o capítulo 3 do XPS *XML Paper Specification* disponível para download em [ http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx ](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx).

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this property in XAML.
trans-unit.target: Você não pode usar essa propriedade em XAML.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to always reload the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> even if it has been previously loaded and cached; <see langword="false" /> to load the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> only if there is no cached version.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para sempre recarregar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />, mesmo que tenha sido carregado e armazenados em cache anteriormente; <see langword="false" /> para carregar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> somente se não houver nenhuma versão armazenada em cache.

trans-unit.source: Loads and returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> content element.
trans-unit.target: Carrega e retorna o elemento de conteúdo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.

trans-unit.source: The root element of the visual tree for this page.
trans-unit.target: O elemento raiz da árvore visual para esta página.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRoot%2A> performs synchronous loading and parsing of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRoot%2A> executa síncrona carregar e analisar o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> instead of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRoot%2A> to avoid thread blocking while the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> loads.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> em vez de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRoot%2A> para evitar o thread de bloqueio durante a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> carrega.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to always reload the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> even if it has been previously loaded and cached; <see langword="false" /> to load the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> only if there is no cached version.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para sempre recarregar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />, mesmo que tenha sido carregado e armazenados em cache anteriormente; <see langword="false" /> para carregar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> somente se não houver nenhuma versão armazenada em cache.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously loads and returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> content element.
trans-unit.target: Carrega e retorna de maneira assíncrona o elemento de conteúdo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> asynchronously loads and parses the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> data stream associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> carrega e analisa de maneira assíncrona o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> fluxo de dados associado a esta <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>.

trans-unit.source: Other threads will continue to run while <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> completes.
trans-unit.target: Outros threads continuará a ser executado enquanto <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> é concluída.

trans-unit.source: The following steps illustrate how to load the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> content asynchronously:
trans-unit.target: As etapas a seguir ilustram como carregar o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> conteúdo de forma assíncrona:

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler> delegate and add it to be notified of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> events.
trans-unit.target: Criar um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler> delegar e adicioná-lo para ser notificado sobre <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Call <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> event occurs and the delegate is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> content has completed loading.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> eventos ocorre e o representante é chamado, o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> conteúdo for carregado.

trans-unit.source: The loaded <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> element is returned through the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>
trans-unit.target: O carregador <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> elemento será retornado por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: property.
trans-unit.target: propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `<PageContent>` element, see chapter 3 of the XPS specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o `<PageContent>` elemento, consulte o capítulo 3 da especificação de XPS, que pode ser obtido em [XPS: especificação e Downloads de licença](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: Cancels any current <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync(System.Boolean)" /> operation in progress.
trans-unit.target: Cancela qualquer operação <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync(System.Boolean)" /> atual em andamento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsyncCancel%2A> cancels any <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> operation that has not already finished with a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsyncCancel%2A> cancela qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> operação que ainda não tiver terminado com um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync(System.Boolean)" /> has completed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync(System.Boolean)" /> é concluído.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> event is handled by methods based on the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> evento é manipulado por métodos de acordo com o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler> delegate.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget" /> elements that identify the hyperlink-addressable locations on the page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de elementos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget" /> que identificam os locais endereçáveis de hiperlink na página.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTargetCollection" /> of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget" /> elements that identify the hyperlink-addressable locations on the page.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTargetCollection" /> de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget" /> elementos que identificam os locais endereçáveis de hiperlink na página.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets%2A> will never return `null`, but the collection may contain zero elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets%2A> nunca retornarão `null`, mas a coleção pode conter zero elementos.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `<PageContent>` element, see chapter 3 of the XPS specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o `<PageContent>` elemento, consulte o capítulo 3 da especificação de XPS, que pode ser obtido em [XPS: especificação e Downloads de licença](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: The serialization services provider.
trans-unit.target: O provedor de serviços de serialização.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Child" /> property should be serialized when this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent" /> is serialized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Child" /> deve ser serializado quando este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent" /> for serializado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="manager" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and it does not have an XmlWriter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="manager" /> não for <see langword="null" /> e não tiver um XmlWriter; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> content data stream.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] para o fluxo de dados de conteúdo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the corresponding <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `<PageContent>` element and its `Source` attribute, see chapter 3 of the XPS specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o `<PageContent>` elemento e seu `Source` atributo, consulte o capítulo 3 da especificação de XPS, que pode ser obtido em [XPS: especificação e Downloads de licença](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source" />.

trans-unit.source: The child <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> filho a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild.AddChild(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte <see cref="M:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild.AddChild(System.Object)" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild>.

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser adicionado ao objeto.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild.AddText(System.String)" />.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte <see cref="M:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild.AddText(System.String)" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext.BaseUri" />.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte <see cref="P:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext.BaseUri" />.

trans-unit.source: The base URI of the current context.
trans-unit.target: O URI de base do contexto atual.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext>.
